statements: SELECT * FROM member_demographics;
SELECT member_id, age, gender FROM member_demographics WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM member_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT member_id, class_preference, membership_type FROM member_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS member_count FROM member_demographics GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM member_demographics WHERE location = 'New York' AND age > 30 ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT member_id, age, gender FROM member_demographics WHERE membership_type = 'Premium' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_members FROM member_demographics GROUP BY location HAVING total_members > 5 ORDER BY total_members DESC;
SELECT class_preference, AVG(age) AS average_age FROM member_demographics GROUP BY class_preference ORDER BY average_age DESC;
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) AS total_count, AVG(age) AS average_age FROM member_demographics GROUP BY gender ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM members WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age FROM members WHERE gender = 'male';
SELECT * FROM members ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM members WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM members JOIN class_preferences ON members.member_id = class_preferences.member_id WHERE class_preferences.level = 'Beginner';
SELECT member_id, name, age, gender, email FROM members WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT member_id, name, email FROM members WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT member_id, name, level, time_preference FROM members INNER JOIN class_preferences ON members.member_id = class_preferences.member_id WHERE preferred_class = 'Yoga' AND level = 'Beginner' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT member_id, name, email FROM members WHERE name LIKE '%John%' OR name LIKE '%Jane%' ORDER BY name ASC, age DESC;

SELECT member_id, name, level, time_preference FROM members INNER JOIN class_preferences ON members.member_id = class_preferences.member_id WHERE time_preference = 'Morning' ORDER BY name ASC, level DESC;
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM members;
SELECT * FROM classes WHERE capacity > 20;
SELECT class_name, instructor, schedule FROM classes WHERE class_id = 3;
SELECT name, age, email FROM members WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM members WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM members WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT class_name, instructor, schedule FROM classes WHERE capacity > 20 ORDER BY class_name ASC;
SELECT preferences.level, preferences.interest, members.name FROM preferences JOIN members ON preferences.member_id = members.member_id WHERE preferences.level = 'Intermediate';

SELECT members.name, preferences.interest, classes.class_name FROM members JOIN preferences ON members.member_id = preferences.member_id JOIN classes ON preferences.class_id = classes.class_id WHERE members.age < 40 ORDER BY members.name DESC, classes.class_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM members WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT member_id, email FROM members ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE preference_type='Fitness';
SELECT class_name, class_description, class_type FROM classes WHERE class_duration > 60;
SELECT * FROM members ORDER BY age DESC, first_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT member_id, first_name, last_name, age FROM members WHERE gender='Male' OR gender='Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT member_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM members WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT m.first_name, m.last_name, p.preference_type, p.preference_value FROM members m INNER JOIN preferences p ON m.member_id = p.member_id ORDER BY m.last_name ASC, p.preference_type DESC;

SELECT c.class_name, c.class_type, cd.registration_date, cd.attendance FROM classes c INNER JOIN class_demographics cd ON c.class_id = cd.class_id WHERE cd.attendance > 10 ORDER BY c.class_name ASC, cd.registration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT member_name, age FROM members WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT member_name, gender FROM members WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT * FROM class_enrollment ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, class_name FROM instructors JOIN classes ON instructors.instructor_id = classes.instructor_id;
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT member_name, age, gender FROM members WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT m.member_name, c.class_name, e.enrollment_date FROM members m JOIN class_enrollment e ON m.member_id = e.member_id JOIN classes c ON c.class_id = e.class_id;

SELECT m.member_name, c.class_name, i.instructor_name FROM members m JOIN class_enrollment e ON m.member_id = e.member_id JOIN classes c ON c.class_id = e.class_id JOIN instructors i ON i.instructor_id = c.instructor_id;

SELECT m.member_name, c.class_name, i.instructor_name FROM members m JOIN class_enrollment e ON m.member_id = e.member_id JOIN classes c ON c.class_id = e.class_id JOIN instructors i ON i.instructor_id = c.instructor_id WHERE m.age < 25 ORDER BY c.start_time ASC;
